roosnest.name: RoosNest
roosnest.subtitle: Parent Portal & Student Activity
roosnest.description: RoosNest is a comprehensive kindergarten management platform designed to streamline communication between parents, teachers, and administrators. It features three distinct interfaces: a Parent Portal for real-time progress tracking and activity galleries, a Teacher Dashboard with instant QR attendance marking, and an Admin panel for system control. Built with React Native, TypeScript, and Supabase, RoosNest delivers a seamless, secure experience across iOS, Android, and Web, solving the challenge of fragmented school communication

yaskitchen.name: Yas Kitchen
yaskitchen.subtitle: Smart meal selection for workers & staff
yaskitchen.description: Yas Kitchen is a cross-platform mess-management application built for workers and staff across the UAE. It allows users to view daily menus, browse specials, and track their food plans through a clean and intuitive interface. The project also includes an admin side, where authorized staff can log in using OTP verification to access meal updates and menu management. Developed using React Native and TypeScript for the frontend, and powered by a robust backend using Supabase and Python, Yas Kitchen ensures smooth performance and consistent behaviour across iOS, Android, and Web
